Maker, Python Blender Game and Interactive Developer, unofficial Blender teacher.
I currently learning Solidity Language..

work.name: ELETTRONICA S.p.A.
work.summary: Symfony 2.3 LTS with Sonata Project Bundle

work.name: Quantum Leap Ip
work.summary:
The company is active in two areas: serach and development of new projects to obtain patent status as well as TEDxRome.

As Part Time consultant, I was the reponsible of project: new Trends Domains. I worked on setup of most little landing page sites using Silex Microframework refactoring the behaviour of multiple wordpress websites with deprecated release.

work.name: 3DItaly
work.summary: Blender Teacher for 3D Printing for a stage.

work.name: Onthebrain
work.position: Web Developer, 3D Graphic Designer, Game Development
work.summary:
On The Brain is a startup company in the interactive advertising business.

As full time consultant I worked on: restyling official website built on CakePhp and Bootstrap. Low poly modellation with Blender and photorealistic rendering for product presentation.
Experienced on Kinect (Depth Sensor) and game engine framework as Unity 3D. All works was made by open source software as Gimp, Inkscape, Blender.
I worked on Leaflet.js with OpenStreetMaps in specific projects and Facebook API.

work.name: UPTER
work.summary:
A course that drive the people to understand 3D Graphic, Blender and 3D Printing.
The course treats also Texturing/Shading and Rendering.

work.name: Creasys
work.summary:
Creasys works on business management web sites development.

As part time consultant I worked on WordPress theme and addon development, restoring and data dumping from existing projects to WordPress. I have utilized in some projects CakePhp and some Symfony components.

work.name: Italia Solidale
work.summary:
Italia Solidale Onlus is a catholic non-profit organization active in the third world countries.

As Part Time consultant I worked in-house Newsletter Web Application against to be listed as email spammer (SwiftMailer and CakePhp) to send big dataset of email around Italy, specially in Christian holidays time. I worked between Brasil and Italy as Donor and in specific Projects.

work.name: Elettronica S.p.A.
work.summary:
Elettronica s.p.a. is a company leader in the electronic defence systems.

Full time employee in the Communication and Advertising division as Full Stack Web Developer. I worked in graphic advertising mainly, and improve old ecosystem intranet with code' snippets.

education.area: comunicazione d'impresa pubblicità e nuovi media

references.name: Luigi Girardi
references.reference:
Giorgio, esperto anche in Comunicazioni e Web Designer, è un ragazzo simpatico, intelligente e molto competente, dotato di una grande e rara umiltà – sentiamo la sua mancanza. 
ciao Luigi

references.name: Carlo Zuccari
references.reference: Giorgio ha fornito dei servizi di consulenza come grafico e webdesigner, molto competente e puntuale, è un'ottima persona ed un diligente professionista.
